name: Alien Weapon #853A
description:
In a faraway lab, even farther planet, and of course distant galaxy, an alien turned into a powerful weapon that was supposed to destroy everything that comes in its path. But the alien did not like the experiment and decided to break through and flee from the lab and hide from the authorities. 

In this experimental game you play as an alien (also called weapon #853A) and the objective is to collect 3 keys that are gathered in each level, and proceed to the door exit.

This is a prototype game - only the main game play and basic graphics are demonstrated in this demo version!
